pkgmetadata.longdescription: ESG - A package for asset projection // The package presents a "Scenarios" class containing general parameters, risk parameters and projection results. Risk parameters are gathered together into a ParamsScenarios sub-object. The general process for using this package is to set all needed parameters in a Scenarios object, use the customPathsGeneration method to proceed to the projection, then use xxx_PriceDistribution() methods to get asset prices.
